sakura:Contract.NAME: Contract?
DESCRIPTIONS: Why hello there. I have quite the deal for you today, form a contract with me and obtain quite the #yspecial relic. NL In exchange I'd like you to beat up the pesky monsters inhabiting the Spire. Form a contract with me and become ~~magical~~.
What a shame. If you ever want to risk your life for the fate of the universe, give me a call.
